pages.text: "We're gonna make it, aren't we sir?"

pages.title: OH.
pages.text:
if you wanna continue the game, you'll need to make it across this bridge

im stating this due to the fact that i didn't know that when i was younger

pages.title: is that a bird? a plane? an alien???
pages.text: it's... an alien alright. an alien in a banshee I HATE BANSHEES!!!!!

pages.title: oh. ew
pages.text:
around here is the first combat encounter in the outdoors!

this is important to note due to the fact that enemies are spread out a lot more when fighting outside, and that there's also generally less cover, due to walls not typically existing out here... also, enemies are usually a lot farther away from you compared to fighting in close quarters, making ranged weapons (like the pistol) more important
